items.text: full outside off, nudged to extra cover's left

items.text: length on leg stump, looks to flick and misses. Deflected off the thigh

items.text: slower ball at a length on off stump, defended into the covers with soft hands
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: length ball down leg side, looks to sweep and appears to have missed it. But Bangladesh have reviewed. For catch behind. And all the tech confirms there is no touch on that and Bangladesh lose their review.
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Guptill, no run

items.text: length outside off, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Guptill, no run

items.text: lifts it over square leg. All the way! Full and pushed through quickly at a middle stump line. It's full enough that there isn't a lot of sweeping room. But he brings down quick arms at this and launches
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Guptill, SIX runs

items.text: length at middle stump, punched to long-on off the back foot
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Guptill, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Taylor, no run

items.text: short and wide outside off. Backs away and cuts it past third man. Too short, too much room. And just as much gratitude from Taylor as he places this
items.postText: Jono: "This team plus Southee, Sodhi, Munro (but at #5/6), and myself. I'm a pretty handy all rounder, used to practise hitting the golf ball against the corrugated iron fence with a stump! " --- Sounds like you'd do well for Australia on uncovered pitches.
items.shortText: Mahmudullah to Taylor, FOUR runs

items.text: off the body as he looks to evade this. Short of a length and jumps up at him as he shapes to cut. Down to third man

items.text: length on off stump, blocked on the front foot
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: length and curving away at middle stump. Flicked to midwicket. A tight single taken. Might have been in trouble with a direct hit
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, punched to sweeper's right on the up
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, 2 runs

items.text: full on middle stump, driven back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Guptill, no run

items.text: short of a length just outside off, chopped to point
items.postText: Paul Bartlett : "With that lovely cut Taylor is now overtaken Fleming and Astle as most runs in ODI at Napier. " --- Indeed! Thanks for digging that out. 747* runs in 15 innings for Taylor here. Astle got 743 in just as many innings, and Fleming had 743 in 19
